argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | latmle.b | |- B = ( Base ` K ) |
| 2 |  | latmle.l | |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) |
| 3 |  | latmle.m | |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_latleeqm1 | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .<_ Y <-> ( X ./\ Y ) = X ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 3 | #P_latmcom | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X ./\ Y ) = ( Y ./\ X ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_eqeq1d | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( ( X ./\ Y ) = X <-> ( Y ./\ X ) = X ) ) |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_bitrd | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .<_ Y <-> ( Y ./\ X ) = X ) ) |
